title: The Call of the Wild (Part 8)
description: John Thornton nurses Buck back to health, forging a strong bond of love between them. Buck saves John Thornton from drowning in a river. Upon their return to Dawson, Buck breaks a thousand-pound sled out of the ice and pulls it one hundred yards to win a bet for Thornton.
meta: Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions, to understand a text
Analyze Plot : Analyze plot throughout a text
Hyphenated and Compound Words : Identify and use hyphenated compound adjectives
